meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to about 185 meters.
meanings.sent1: The race was measured in stadions, making it easy to track the distance.
meanings.sent2: The stadion is a common unit of measurement used in ancient times.
meanings.sent3: I tried to measure the length of the room using stadions, but it was too long!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to finish the marathon was as long as a stadion.
meanings.sent5: The coach marked the running track with stadions to help the athletes pace themselves.

meanings.sent1: The stadion was filled with cheering fans during the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The football team played their final match at the stadion.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my hat at the stadion after the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced as she entered the stadion for her first performance.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the stadion illuminated the night sky during the event.
